text: Diane Rehm (born Diane Aed; September 21, 1936) is an American journalist. She hosts Diane Rehm: On My Mind podcast, produced at WAMU, which is licensed to American University in Washington, D.C.. She is the former American public radio talk show host of The Diane Rehm Show, which was distributed nationally and internationally by National Public Radio. The show was produced at WAMU. Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:American radio personalities
title: Diane Rehm
